messages.subject: RE: "welcoming" response
messages.msgSnippet: Retta, this is one of the very few posts I m printing and keeping. May ... It is priceless, one of those things you know that you know.  My teacher came up
messages.messageBody:
" Retta, this is one of the very few posts I'm printing and keeping.
May
> I
> have permission to forward it? And is there a book that talks about
> this or
> is it your own realization. Either way, it's priceless!
>
> Karen"

It is priceless, one of those things you know that you know. My teacher came up with this in his own struggle to live peacefully in a chaotic world. Yes, share this "welcoming" list, just please type in at the bottom:

"Reproduced from the The Gift of Being Welcomed by Rich Chakrin"

Fondly,

Retta
